messages.title: BEWARE!
messages.content: With the election drawing nearer, it’s clear that the Conservatives are turning to their regular negative campaign tactics and trying to con voters.

messages.title: Don't be conned by the Conservatives…
messages.content: To get rid of the Labour Government, people need to vote out Labour MPs. But that’s not stopping the Conservatives from trying to tell voters differently.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of the country, there are no Labour MPs to vote out. In those areas, the choice is between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

quotes.text: David Cameron accused of 'bussing in' Tory supporters to pose as students during speech on 'openness and trust'
Tories are at the centre of a dirty tricks row…
…it looks as if the Tories couldn't resist playing dirty…

images.caption: Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and a fairer Britain
